2025-07-01.content: [Policy Simulator for Organization Policy](https://cloud.google.com/policy-intelligence/docs/test-organization-policies) is now [generally available (GA)](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: Policy Simulator for Organization Policy Now Generally Available
summary.summary: The Policy Simulator for Organization Policy is now generally available, allowing you to test policies and ensure your configurations are set up correctly.

2025-06-13.content: Custom organization policies are now generally available for some API Keys. For more information, see [Creating and managing custom constraints](https://cloud.google.com/api-keys/docs/custom-constraints).

summary.title: New: Custom Organization Policies for API Keys
summary.summary: Custom organization policies for API keys are now generally available. This feature allows for more granular control over API key usage. For more details, refer to the documentation on custom constraints.

2025-06-10.content: You can use custom constraints with Organization Policy to provide more granular control over specific fields for indexes and index endpoints in Vector Search. For more information, see [Create custom constraints for Vector Search](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/vector-search/custom-constraints).

summary.title: Custom constraints for Vector Search
summary.summary: You can now use custom constraints with Organization Policy to control specific fields for indexes and index endpoints in Vector Search.
